summary: After retiring to the beautiful Mexican town of Guanajuato, a 70 year old decides to follow his dreams and enroll at the university where he stumbles upon a new generation and they are bound together by the novel Don Quijote de la Mancha.
cast: Jorge Lavat|Norma Lazareno|José Carlos Ruiz|Cristina Obregón|Pablo Cruz|Siouzana Melikian|Jorge Luis Moreno|Cuauhtémoc Duque|Jeannine Derbez|Daniel Martínez|Silvia Santoyo|Jeronimo Medina|Raúl Adalid|Sofía Taache|Fernando Estrada|Jessica Rangel|Clarissa Rendón
title: El Estudiante
